name: Chairperson, secretary
text: [§4E-2]  Chairperson, secretary.  The representative from the department of land and natural resources shall serve as secretary of the board and as custodian of its official records.  The board shall select one of its members as chairperson of the board to serve for a term of four years or until the chairperson's successor is selected. [L 1974, c 50, pt of §2; gen ch 1985, 1993]
